SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REVIEW_NO , MEM_NO , CREATE_DATE , TITLE , CONTENT , PR_RATING , P_RATING , R_RATING , LIKE_Review FROM REVIEW RV WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC , REVIEW_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT ROWNUM, C.* FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT IMG.IMAGE_NO , IMG.REF_BNO , IMG.ORIGIN_NAME , IMG.CHANGE_NAME , IMG.FILE_PATH , IMG.UPLOAD_DATE , IMG.FILE_LEVEL FROM IMAGE IMG JOIN REVIEW RV ON (IMG.STATUS = RV.STATUS) WHERE RV.REVIEW_NO = ? AND IMG.STATUS = 'Y' AND IMG.REF_BNO = RV.MEM_NO AND IMG.UPLOAD_DATE = RV.CREATE_DATE AND IMG.IMAGE_NO >= RV.REVIEW_NO AND IMG.FILE_LEVEL = 'R' ) A UNION SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT IMG.IMAGE_NO , IMG.REF_BNO , IMG.ORIGIN_NAME , IMG.CHANGE_NAME , IMG.FILE_PATH , IMG.UPLOAD_DATE , IMG.FILE_LEVEL FROM IMAGE IMG JOIN REVIEW RV ON (IMG.STATUS = RV.STATUS) WHERE RV.REVIEW_NO = ? AND IMG.STATUS = 'Y' AND IMG.REF_BNO = 0 AND IMG.UPLOAD_DATE >= RV.CREATE_DATE AND IMG.IMAGE_NO >= RV.REVIEW_NO AND IMG.FILE_LEVEL = 'R' ) B ) C WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 1 ORDER BY IMAGE_NO DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, C.* FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT IMG.IMAGE_NO , IMG.ORIGIN_NAME , IMG.CHANGE_NAME , IMG.FILE_PATH FROM IMAGE IMG JOIN REVIEW RV ON (IMG.STATUS = RV.STATUS) WHERE RV.MEM_NO >= IMG.REF_BNO AND IMG.STATUS = 'Y' AND RV.REVIEW_NO = ? AND IMG.UPLOAD_DATE >= RV.CREATE_DATE AND IMG.IMAGE_NO >= RV.REVIEW_NO AND IMG.FILE_LEVEL = 'R' ) A UNION SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT IMG.IMAGE_NO , IMG.ORIGIN_NAME , IMG.CHANGE_NAME , IMG.FILE_PATH FROM IMAGE IMG JOIN REVIEW RV ON (IMG.STATUS = RV.STATUS) WHERE IMG.REF_BNO = 0 AND IMG.STATUS = 'Y' AND RV.REVIEW_NO = ? AND IMG.UPLOAD_DATE > RV.CREATE_DATE AND IMG.IMAGE_NO > RV.REVIEW_NO AND IMG.FILE_LEVEL = 'R' ) B ) C WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 1 ORDER BY IMAGE_NO DESC
SELECT MEM_NO FROM REVIEW RV WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REVIEW_NO , PCODE , MEM_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , CREATE_DATE , P_RATING , R_RATING , PR_RATING , LIKE_Review FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?

SELECT IMG.IMAGE_NO, IMG.REF_BNO, IMG.ORIGIN_NAME, IMG.CHANGE_NAME, IMG.FILE_PATH, IMG.UPLOAD_DATE, RV.MEM_NO, RV.CREATE_DATE FROM IMAGE IMG JOIN REVIEW RV ON (IMG.REF_BNO = RV.MEM_NO) WHERE IMG.REF_BNO = RV.MEM_NO AND IMG.FILE_LEVEL = 'R' AND IMG.STATUS = 'Y' AND RV.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY IMG.UPLOAD_DATE DESC , RV.CREATE_DATE DESC
UPDATE REVIEW SET TITLE = ? , CONTENT = ? , P_RATING = ? , R_RATING = ? , PR_RATING = ? WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
UPDATE IMAGE IMG SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? , FILE_PATH = ? WHERE IMAGE_NO in ? AND IMG.REF_BNO in (SELECT RV.MEM_NO FROM REVIEW RV WHERE RV.MEM_NO = IMG.REF_BNO)
INSERT INTO IMAGE IMG ( IMAGE_NO , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , UPLOAD_DATE , FILE_LEVEL , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_I_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'R' , 'Y' )
